title: How to use Audacity track labels for language learning [+ convert them to subtitles]

media:group.media:title: How to use Audacity track labels for language learning [+ convert them to subtitles]
media:group.media:description:
Visit my blog for more: https://www.mezzoguild.com
Content used from: https://www.talkinarabic.com

**Correction: .SRT subtitles need a comma after the seconds, not a full stop. e.g. 00:00:00,000 - not: 00:00:00.000. Won't work otherwise.**

I've talked about Audacity briefly before.

I use it religiously in my own language learning and it's got a lot of uses. One of which is track labeling and converting those track labels to subtitles.

Like this style of video? Let me know in the comment section and I'll do more just like it.
